alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:53PM CDT until April 06 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL DEKALB COUNTY... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Payne, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Payne, Sylvania, Valley Head, Hammondville, Mentone, Pine Ridge, Adamsburg, Desoto State Park and Little River Canyon NP. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
